name: Kept Safe
description:
Help your future self journey through memories of your family home.   Home is memories, nostalgia, and family.

Press space to see instructions and start game.

Press space to inspect and collect objects in the house and press I to view your inventory. Press R in the main scene to switch between worlds, one being you in the past and another as you in the future returning to your childhood home.

To end game, press C for credits, then R to return to start
